name: Kael, the Deserter
text: Deploy: Kael may immediately move to an adjacent turnpoint.
flavor_text: He left his unit in century 2400. The silence that followed was louder than any order.

abilities.name: Temporal Dash
abilities.description: Move Kael to any adjacent turnpoint. Does not cost a move action.

name: Mira, the Forger
text: Activate: Heal an adjacent friendly operator for 2 HP.
flavor_text: She rewrote a thousand identities before the streams found her own.

abilities.name: Reconstruct
abilities.description: Restore 2 HP to a friendly operator in the same or adjacent turnpoint.

name: Voss, the Warden
text: Activate: Prevent an adjacent enemy operator from moving next turn.
flavor_text: He kept the gates sealed for three centuries. Some of the prisoners were innocent.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.description: Target enemy operator in the same or adjacent turnpoint cannot move until end of next turn.

name: Ash, the Burner
text: Activate: Deal 1 damage to ALL operators in the same turnpoint, including friendlies.
flavor_text: Century 2200's archives burned for eleven days. Nobody asked what was in them.

abilities.name: Ignite
abilities.description: Deal 1 damage to every operator in Ash's current turnpoint, including friendly operators.

name: Sable, the Witness
text: Activate: Reduce target operator's ATK by 1 until end of turn (minimum 0).
flavor_text: She saw everything. Reported to everyone. Trusted by none.

abilities.name: Expose
abilities.description: Reduce target enemy operator's ATK by 1 until end of turn. Minimum 0. Target must be in same or adjacent turnpoint.

name: Thane, the Anchor
text: Activate: Remove one negative status effect from Thane.
flavor_text: When timeline 7R collapsed, he held it open for nine seconds. Enough for twelve people. Not thirteen.

abilities.name: Stabilize
abilities.description: Remove one negative status effect from Thane. If Thane has no negative effects, gain 1 HP instead (up to max).

name: Temporal Fracture
flavor_text: A crack in the century. Brief, precise, irreversible.

name: Stream Mending
text: Restore 3 HP to target friendly operator.
flavor_text: The timeline stitches itself shut. For now.

name: Surge Protocol
text: Target friendly operator gains +2 ATK until end of turn.

name: Chrono Severance
text: Deal 5 damage to target operator. If this eliminates the target, gain 1 AP.
flavor_text: Some threads are not meant to continue.

name: Dead Century
text: Place on a turnpoint. All operators here take 1 damage at the end of each turn. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor_text: Century 2300 went dark. Nothing survived there â€” nothing should.

name: Temporal Haven
text: Place on a turnpoint. Friendly operators here restore 1 HP at the start of your turn. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor_text: A stable pocket. Rare. Temporary. Enough.

name: Stream Collapse
text: Place on a turnpoint. No operator may move into or out of this turnpoint. Lasts 2 turns.
flavor_text: The path folds inward. Those inside are trapped. Those outside are spared.

name: Null Blade
text: Attach to a friendly operator. That operator gains +2 ATK permanently. Destroyed if the operator is eliminated.
flavor_text: Forged from a severed timeline. It cuts what shouldn't exist.

name: Phase Armor
text: Attach to a friendly operator. That operator gains +3 max HP and +3 current HP. Destroyed if the operator is eliminated.
flavor_text: Woven from overlapping realities. Each layer is a timeline that almost was.
